title: Igor Zakurdayev
text: Igor Valeryevich Zakurdayev (born January 26, 1987) is a skier who competed in <a href="Alpine%20Skiing">Alpine Skiing</a> in <a href="Vancouver%202010">Vancouver 2010</a> and <a href="Sochi%202014">Sochi 2014</a>. He was born in <a href="Ridder%2C%20Kazakhstan">Ridder, Kazakhstan</a>.
